pages.text: Welcome to Hexhaven! We're excited to have you. This book has all the information you'll need to know about the server, so please take a moment to read it. $(br2)The mod team is made up of regular folks who love playing on Hexhaven, same as you.

Feel free to ask us any questions you may have, big or small. If you need to reach us privately, please make a $(l:https://discord.com/channels/1076365835284787220/1279073945475088475)ticket$(). Happy witching! $(br2)- The Mod Team
